Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientMessage
    Abstract class representing a message sent to the client.
    DieColorMessage
    Notifies the player of the color of the die extracted from the bag after using tool card 11.
    EndTurnMessage
    Notifies the player of the end of his turn.
    ErrorMessage
    Contains an integer explaining the error occurred: 1: username already used; 2: invalid move; 3: unexpected message from parser; 4: not enough tokens to use the card or already used a card this turn; 5: reconnection but player is online.
    GameOverMessage
    Notifies the player of the end of the game, telling the name of the winner.
    LoginRequestMessage
    Notifies the player of the start of the game and the need for a personal username in order to play Contains everything needed to be transformed into a Json string to be sent across the network as a source of information.
    NewTurnMessage
    Notifies the player of the start of his turn.
    NotificationMessage
    Notifies the player of a connection-related event.
    OkMessage
    Notifies the player of the positive outcome of a move.
    ShowTableMessage
    Contains the list of the public objectives regarding the current game, the private objective of a player and the list off all the tool cards with status and description of each one.
    ShowWindowsMessage
    Contains four window patterns from which the player will choose the one he wants to play the game with.
    UpdateModelMessage
    Contains all the elements of the game: - round is the index of the current round; - players is the list off all the players involved in the game; - draft contains all the dice in the draft pool; - roundTrack contains all the dice in the round track.
